languages.text: Муки толкают людей на жестокие преступления в поисках хоть какого-то питья. Эти темные события останутся в истории колонии как Великая жажда.
The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.
languages.original_text: Муки толкают людей на жестокие преступления в поисках хоть какого-то питья. Эти темные события останутся в истории колонии как Великая жажда.

traits.locale_text: The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for a drink of anything that could quench their suffering. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for a drink of anything that could quench their suffering. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.
The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.
The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

languages.text: La gente atormentada se ve empujada a cometer crímenes espantosos por una gota de alcohol. Estos oscuros eventos se recordarán por siempre en los anales de la colonia como la Gran Sequía.
languages.original_text: The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

traits.locale_text: La gente atormentada se ve empujada a cometer crímenes espantosos por una gota de alcohol. Estos oscuros eventos se recordarán por siempre en los anales de la colonia como la Gran Sequía.

languages.text: 苦しめられた人々は、一滴の飲み物のために恐ろしい犯罪を犯すようになる。このような暗い出来事は、コロニーの歴史に「大いなる渇き」として永遠に記憶されることとなった。
languages.original_text: The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

traits.locale_text: 苦しめられた人々は、一滴の飲み物のために恐ろしい犯罪を犯すようになる。このような暗い出来事は、コロニーの歴史に「大いなる渇き」として永遠に記憶されることとなった。

languages.text: 受到折磨的人们犯下了无数可怕的罪行，仅仅是为了稍微填饱肚子。这场被称为“大饥渴”的可怕事件，将会被永远铭刻在殖民地的编年史上。
languages.original_text: The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

traits.locale_text: 受到折磨的人们犯下了无数可怕的罪行，仅仅是为了稍微填饱肚子。这场被称为“大饥渴”的可怕事件，将会被永远铭刻在殖民地的编年史上。

languages.text: Die gepeinigten Bürger begehen fürchterliche Verbrechen, nur um einen Tropfen zu trinken zu bekommen. Diese dunklen Tage gehen als "Der große Durst" in die Annalen der Kolonie ein.
languages.original_text: The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

traits.locale_text: Die gepeinigten Bürger begehen fürchterliche Verbrechen, nur um einen Tropfen zu trinken zu bekommen. Diese dunklen Tage gehen als "Der große Durst" in die Annalen der Kolonie ein.

languages.text: Contraints de se disputer la moindre goutte d'eau, les habitants tourmentés en arrivent à commettre des crimes innommables. Ces sinistres événements resteront à jamais gravés dans les annales de la colonie sous le nom de Grande Soif.
languages.original_text: The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.

traits.locale_text: Contraints de se disputer la moindre goutte d'eau, les habitants tourmentés en arrivent à commettre des crimes innommables. Ces sinistres événements resteront à jamais gravés dans les annales de la colonie sous le nom de Grande Soif.

languages.text: Izdırap içindeki halk, bir damla içecek uğruna korkunç suçlar işlemeye yöneliyor. Bu karanlık olaylar, koloninin yıllıklarında Büyük Susuzluk olarak ebediyen hatırlanacak.
languages.original_text: The tormented people are driven to commit terrible crimes for the sake of a drop to drink. These dark events will be forever remembered in the colony's annals as the Great Thirst.
